testcase.classname: user book the hotel for staying purpose and bill the order id
testcase.name: user book the hotel and print the bill in console
testcase.system-out: Given user must be in homepage of adacthotel application....................passed When user pass the "manimaddy" and "5WZ2NI" in login page...................passed And user click the login button.............................................passed And user choose location....................................................passed And user choose hotels......................................................passed And user book roomtype......................................................passed And user has to choose roomno on that page..................................passed And user choose checkin and checkout options................................passed And user chhose adult and child details filled..............................passed And user click final search button..........................................passed Then user print order id in console.........................................passed
